This game is both the worst and best game I ever played. It makes me want to end my life one moment, then celebrate in pure joy the next. It makes me feel stupid that i just gambled away real money for a stupid texture on a gun, but also gives me hope that I could make a profit off of what i just got. I hate and love this game and i'm ok with that.

10/10 - F you Valve

This is a game I keep coming back to. It's a balanced competitive team game, where you learn to improve by playing with and against skilled players. The competitive scene is enormous, and features live tournaments held in major cities across the globe.
Edit: There's an operation going on. Two years is too long a wait, but now it's here I can't help myself.
Edit No. 2: The last operation ran for about 5 months, and ended about 8 months ago. F
